title: Wireless nights
creator_credit: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School, Chris McGill and Melissa Juhanson
brief_description: Each night from midnight to dawn Melbourne’s night owls and insomniacs tune their radios to the voice 3AW’s Keith McGowan. “Wireless nights” explores the richness and drama of this unique group of people, self-named “The Overnighters”, as they share their lives across the airwaves.
creator_credit_for_label: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School, Chris McGill and Melissa Juhanson
